Type: GABA analog, analgesic
Dosage Forms:
Routes of Administration: oral
Common Trade Names: Lyrica

Special_Populations.text:
Pregnancy Rating
: C (though fetal risk has been demonstrated)
Lactation risk: Infant risk has been demonstrated
Renal dosing: reduce dose per manufacturer/FDA guidelines
Hepatic dosing:

Angioedema, hypersensitivity reaction
Jaundice
Elevated creatine kinase level
Suicidal thoughts

Common.text:
Constipation, xerostomia, weight gain
Peripheral edema
Dizziness, ataxia, somnolence, blurred vision, headache
Nasopharyngitis
Disturbance in thinking, euphoria
